name: Holy Family Day Home
description: Provide affordable, high quality, early childhood education and family support services in a stable and nurturing environment, thereby providing the children of working families skills and hope for lifelong development. This continues a tradition established in 1900 by the Sisters of the Holy Family. Their vision is for more Bay Area children and families to have the opportunity and skills to maintain stable, healthy lives, realize their potential, and better contribute to their community.
